mapper.select: SELECT COUNT( id ) AS users, DATE_FORMAT( add_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS day FROM cskaoyanmall_user GROUP BY day
SELECT SUM( actual_price ) as amount, COUNT( id ) as orders, COUNT( user_id ) as customers, AVG( actual_price ) as pcr, DATE_FORMAT(add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as day FROM cskaoyanmall_order GROUP BY day

SELECT sum( o.actual_price ) as amount, COUNT( o.id ) as orders, COUNT( g.order_id ) as products, DATE_FORMAT(o.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as day FROM cskaoyanmall_order AS o INNER JOIN cskaoyanmall_order_goods AS g ON o.id = order_id GROUP BY day
